media:group.media:title: The Holiday PC Buyer's Guide - 2022
media:group.media:description:
Thanks to Amazon for sponsoring our 2022 Holiday Buyers Guide! We have our built out PC kits below, but if you're looking for gifts this season, check out Amazon's own Holiday Gift Guide at https://geni.us/nXANf7e and their Electronics Showcase at https://geni.us/Q9zJA.
Looking to build a new PC for yourself or someone else? We've got you covered this holiday season at a ton of different price points in our latest Holiday Buyers Guide.
Discuss on the forum: https://linustechtips.com/topic/1465010-the-ultimate-holiday-buyers-guide-2022-sponsored/
$300 Build
Buy an AMD Ryzen 5 4600G: https://geni.us/5JoQ13 Buy a Gigabyte GA A320M S2H Micro ATX: https://geni.us/Ams7Aa Buy a Kit of Patriot Signature Line 8GB DDR4: https://geni.us/w7kHXJ Buy a Teamgroup T-Force Vulcan Z 240GB SSD: https://geni.us/Itf6 Buy a Zalman S3 ATX Mid Tower Case: https://geni.us/SG9KB19 Buy a Thermaltake Smart 430 W 80+ PSU: https://geni.us/YcL3 Buy an Amazon Basics Keyboard and Mouse: https://geni.us/GHWNw
$500 Build
Buy an AMD Ryzen 5 4600G: https://geni.us/5JoQ13 Buy an ASRock B550 PG Riptide Micro ATX: https://geni.us/1C3FmvV Buy a Kit of Corsair Vengeance 3200 16GB DDR4: https://geni.us/zILm2 Buy a Crucial P3 Plus 1 TB M.2 PCIe SSD: https://geni.us/BrRQt Buy a Fractal Design Focus G ATX Mid Tower Case: https://geni.us/ks6NxI Buy a Thermaltake Smart BX1 750 W 80+ Bronze PSU: https://geni.us/D7SF
$1000 Build
Buy an Intel Core i5-12400F: https://geni.us/PDKAzcq Buy an MSI Pro Z690-P DDR4 ATX LGA1700: https://geni.us/siRh Buy a kit of Corsair Vengeance LPX 16 GB DDR4: https://geni.us/tdQh Buy an ASRock Radeon RX6700XT CLD 12G: https://geni.us/AiEzv Buy a DIYPC Shadow H3 ARGB ATX Mid Tower Case: https://geni.us/l3id1Bd Buy a Thermaltake Smart BM2 750 W 80+ Bronze PSU: https://geni.us/JLPH6
$1500 Build
Buy an Intel Core i5-12600K: https://geni.us/9ua9M26 Buy a Thermalright Peerless Assassin 120 SE Cooler: https://geni.us/y7C5Ih2 Buy an Asrock Z690 PG Riptide ATX LGA 1700: https://geni.us/VBHBMaJ Buy a kit of Corsair Vengeance 16GB DDR4: https://geni.us/rPXP Buy an ASRock Phantom D OC Rdeon RX 6900 XT: https://geni.us/1kAvEZ Buy a Fractal Design Focus 2 RGB ATX Midtower Case: https://geni.us/UUE4 Buy a Thermaltake Smart BX1 750W 80+ Bronze PSU: https://geni.us/DbH2j
$2000 Build
Buy an Intel Core i5-13600KF: https://geni.us/5snhEa Buy a Thermalright Peerless Assassin 120 SE Cooler: https://geni.us/NIQik3o Buy an MSI Proz Z790-P Wifi DDR4 ATX LGA1700: https://geni.us/vu6gBc Buy a Kit of 16GB Corsair Vengeance RGB Pro SL DDR4: https://geni.us/ppXe Buy a Seagate Barracuda Compute 2 TB HDD: https://geni.us/cUMnG Buy a Samsung 980 Pro 2 TB M.2 PCIe NVME SSD: https://geni.us/57TBeH9 Buy a Phanteks Eclipse P500A D RGB ATX Mid Tower Case: https://geni.us/FdRxWdr Buy an Asus Rog Strix 750 W 80+ Gold Modular PSU: https://geni.us/kRIUl
You can find a wide variety of inexpensive tech accessories through AmazonBasics at https://geni.us/VvoBd

media:group.media:title: My Investment is in TROUBLE
media:group.media:description:
Thanks to HP for sponsoring this video! you can learn more about the HP 845 G9 at: https://bit.ly/3ztZIJp
For years, there’s been an unfriendly trend of replacing socketed, swappable components like RAM and SSDs for ones that come soldered to the motherboard. Great for keeping device thickness to a minimum, but not so great for reparability. Let’s see what HP did to buck that trend.
Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.

entry.title: This PC is TERRIFYING - Intel Extreme Tech Upgrade

media:group.media:title: This PC is TERRIFYING - Intel Extreme Tech Upgrade
media:group.media:description:
Thanks to Intel for sponsoring this video! You can purchase an Intel 12700K at https://geni.us/RPyj54U
Alex is hosting his first Intel Extreme Tech Upgrade, and we couldn't just make it easy for him. Tynan came ready to go with copper hardline tubing, a sick case and even an induction forge to make it all happen. Will these guys be able to make our most intense ETU yet?

entry.title: It’s time for some hard truth

media:group.media:title: It’s time for some hard truth
media:group.media:description:
Communicative effectively with the right tone at work! Sign up for an account and get 20% off Grammarly Premium: https://grammarly.com/LTT
Check out SignalRGB and sync all your RGB peripherals at https://bit.ly/LinusTips
Every industry has its fair share of people and companies aiming to perfect the craft... but that aim has lead to a number of shady snake oil solutions that don't actually improve anything. Today, we look at one of those.
Discuss on the forum: https://linustechtips.com/topic/1464349-it%E2%80%99s-time-for-some-hard-truth-aqvox-se-audiophile-network-switch/

media:group.media:title: DON'T Game at 8K
media:group.media:description:
Thanks to MSI for sponsoring this video! You can purchase your own RTX 4090 SUPRIM Liquid X 24G at https://geni.us/2CGki. If you're looking for a great 4K monitor for your gaming, check out the MSI Optix MPG321UR-QD at https://geni.us/3rjRBV
8K gaming is finally possible with the new RTX 4090, but does anyone REALLY care? How much of a difference can you even see in games on a giant 8K TV?
Discuss on the forum: https://linustechtips.com/topic/1464158-you-can-game-at-8k%E2%80%A6-but-don%E2%80%99t-sponsored/

entry.title: I Pray This Computer Sucks.. Cuz I’m gonna sell it for $1

media:group.media:title: I Pray This Computer Sucks.. Cuz I’m gonna sell it for $1
media:group.media:description:
Create your build at https://www.buildredux.com/linus
Try FreshBooks free, for 30 days, no credit card required at https://www.freshbooks.com/linus
Today Linus is rolling dice to decide what does into a computer.. but there is a twist. Whatever computer he rolls must be sold for $1. Best case for Linus the computer will be $373, worst case it will be $16,795.

media:group.media:title: Are Expensive SSDs Worth It? #SHORTS #pcgaming #ssd
media:group.media:description:

entry.title: They Sent a $45,000 Bill... Then Ghosted Us.

media:group.media:title: They Sent a $45,000 Bill... Then Ghosted Us.
media:group.media:description:
Check out the MSI RTX 4090 SUPRIM: https://www.msi.com/Graphics-Card/GeForce-RTX-4090-SUPRIM-X-24G
TEAMGROUP's Black Friday/Cyber Monday Sale: https://bit.ly/3FffwDC TEAMGROUP Delta RGB DDR5 6400 - White at Micro Center: https://bit.ly/3CGMObR
The lab is spending mucho money on an Anechoic EMC Chamber. What does that mean? It means a big box, it means carbon-impregnated, it means WIFI, it means FOAM. And a whole mess of an order.

Use link https://wealthfront.com/LTT to open a Wealthfront Cash Account and start saving today. Thanks Wealthfront!
SmartDeploy: Claim your FREE IT software (worth $580!) at https://lmg.gg/SDOct
Nvidia's RTX 4090 is the new king of GPUs. It laughs at last generation ray tracing performance, it shrugs off the most demanding of games, it... recommends a power supply with 850 to 1000 watts?! There's got to be a better way - and it starts with undervolting.
Discuss on the forum: https://linustechtips.com/topic/1463304-i-think-i-can-fix-the-rtx-4090/
Buy an ASUS ROG Thor 1000W PSU: https://geni.us/hYBuKg Buy an ASUS ROG Thor 850W PSU: https://geni.us/ISMMx Buy a Seasonic Prime TX-750 PSU: https://geni.us/QHMjmT2 Buy a Seasonic Prime 650W PSU: https://geni.us/QJ4wC3 Buy a Seasonic FOCUS GX-550 PSU: https://geni.us/A1SFrHe Buy an MSI GeForce RTX 4090 24GB: https://geni.us/RzBWp3 Buy a ZOTAC GeForce RTX 4090 24GB: https://geni.us/WANob9i Buy an AMD Ryzen 9 7900X: https://geni.us/erid8M Buy a 32GB Kit of Trident Z5 NEO DDR5: https://geni.us/wUAED8M

media:group.media:title: Roasting OUR worst setups!
media:group.media:description:
Thanks to ORIGIN PC for sponsoring this video! Check out their new EVO 15-S system at: https://bit.ly/LTT_EVO15S
The team at LMG are a diverse bunch with a wide-ranging skillset - and they often use those skills to cast a critical eye on the choices Linus makes with his setups. Today though, we play the uno reverse card: it’s time for Linus and Luke to judge the choices their own staff make, and publicly roast their setups!
Discuss on the forum: https://linustechtips.com/topic/1463080-roasting-my-staff%E2%80%99s-pc-setups/

Join us in War Thunder for FREE at https://playwt.link/joinltt Get an exclusive bonus using our link - thanks for supporting the channel!
Plouffe was voluntold to daily drive the Azeron Cyborg for at least a MONTH. It definitely has a wide range of benefits, but do they outweigh the cons and annoyances? Is this the controller or gamepad replacement you've been looking for?
